p: The stage assignments from all the studied units derive from previous biostratigraphical studies, particularly those of Imlay ( 1947, 1956, 1967, 1980). The biostratigraphical zonation and correlation of the Gypsum Spring Formation is reviewed in Clement & Holland ( 2016), that of the Sundance is summarized by Calloman ( 1982) and Kvale etÂ al. ( 2001), and Imlay ( 1967) documents the biostratigraphy of the Twin Creek Formation.
